sentences.english: It concludes with a perspective on naming in information management.

sentences.english: Most Indian firms work on IT projects for back offices, information management systems for their various business processes, said Hsu.
sentences.chinese: 多數印度公司從事後臺IT支持和信息管理，許說。

sentences.english: Information management has a long history.
The application of the Data Warehouse(DW)technology in financial information management is discussed.

sentences.english: An effective information-management policy must support both kinds of users.
sentences.chinese: 有效的信息管理策略必須同時支持這兩種類型的用戶。

sentences.english: It reflected an information management the catholicity and the society of the activity.

sentences.english: Presentation is often the most-overlooked aspect of information management.
sentences.chinese: 信息的表示通常是信息管理中最容易被忽略的方面。
